mapper.select: SELECT id,name,startTime,endTime,rule,points,type,status,createTime,lastUpdate,imageUrl,ruleName,ruleCode,count,skipURL, (select count(1) from uc_user_task uut where uut.userId=#{userId} and uut.taskId=ust.id and uut.status='1' and uut.createTime >= (SELECT CURDATE()) and uut.createTime < (SELECT DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL -1 DAY))) finishedCount from uc_sys_task ust where status=1 and type=#{type} ORDER BY lastUpdate DESC
